channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Real Cookie Banner: GDPR (DSGVO) & ePrivacy Cookie Consent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Real Cookie Banner: GDPR (DSGVO) & ePrivacy Cookie Consent

item.title: CVE-2022-4507|2024-08-03T01:41:45.615Z -- unknown -- real%20cookie%20banner%3A%20gdpr%20%28dsgvo%29%20%26%20eprivacy%20cookie%20consent
item.description: The Real Cookie Banner WordPress plugin before 3.4.10 does not validate and escapes some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in the page, which could allow users with a role as low as a contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks against logged-in admins.
